title: Pounding Hooves
description: Lori Goodman had discovered the most beautiful horse in the world, but finding her and owning her were two different things!Storm: the regal Arabian mare that others had failed to tame...Darlene: the girl who had everything, but always wanted what belonged to someone else - who also had the money and the mind to make things hers...Ken: Lori's secret love, whom Darlene also threatened to steal away...
author: Dorothy Grunbock Johnston
